name: PARADISE (itch) (FrostBandit)
description:
This is an early prototype that we would love to get some feedback on.  If you're interested in trying we'd greatly appreciate it!

THE STORY

In the future life expectancy has started to decrease drastically, and rather than fixing the issues causing this people are looking for solutions to artificially prolong their lives. One such solution is PARADISE, a program to which your consciousness is uploaded after your death. But what happens if the upload process goes wrong?

THE GAMEPLAY

Have you ever looked at something in the distance that looked smaller than it is, but felt like you could easily pick it up or jump over it? In PARADISE you can do exactly that, since depth does not exist for you. Everything is exactly as it seems on your screen. 

To exit the game press F1 to get to the main screen and then F1 again to quit.

If you try the game and like it (or don't!) and want to help us out we have a short survey you can fill out: https://forms.gle/4rNGvPbQBxmtE6gB6. 

You can also join our discord if you want to follow the development here: https://discord.gg/eVgcW7m
